text:
October 26, 196 0
Mrs. Gertrude Broderick
Office of Education
Washington 25, D. C.
Dear Gertrude:
It has been a pleasure to work with you on the Membership
Committee of the NAEB. May I commend you for your part in
bringing the membership total to a new high, now in excess
of 1000. We have a great professional association, and you
have helped make it so.
With kindest regards, I am
Sincerely yours,
RDH/ml
Raymond D. Hurlbert
General Manager
Dear Bill: A copy of this letter has been mailed to all members
of the Membership Committee.
RDH
